Powerful, flexible, beautiful, easy to use, just to name a few features. How could you not love it?

[/mixt_iconbox][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4" offset="vc_col-xs-6"][mixt_iconbox title="Blazing Fast" icon_color="accent" icon_bg="white" icon_size="icon-lg" icon_pos="title-left" icon="fa fa-bolt"]

Well organized and optimized code minimizes the performance footprint and saves loading time.

[/mixt_iconbox][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4" offset="vc_col-xs-6"][mixt_iconbox title="Modular Awesomeness" icon_color="accent" icon_bg="white" icon_size="icon-lg" icon_pos="title-left" icon="fa fa-cubes"]

A full-featured theme, build an awesome site out of the box! Forget about those expensive addons.

[/mixt_iconbox][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4" offset="vc_col-xs-6"][mixt_iconbox title="Coded by the book" icon_color="accent" icon_bg="grey" icon_size="icon-lg" icon_pos="title-left" icon="fa fa-code"]

Clean, semantic and well organized code is the foundation of MIXT, and the foundation is solid.

The Ultimate Theme

 

The product of hundreds of hours of work, experimenting and testing, MIXT is one of the most ambitious and full-featured themes available on the market.

Whether you want to create a one-page product presentation, an online store, a portfolio, an agency website, blog and everything in between, it has you covered. Provide the content, and the rest is taken care of.

item.title: Elements
item.dc:creator: alex
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]To make building any kind of website as easy as drag-and-dropping content on the pages, MIXT comes packed with 14 highly versatile elements, each one with various styles, colors and many other options, so they look great with any type of design.[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image="871" img_size="full" alignment="center" style="vc_box_outline" css_animation="appear"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][mixt_headline]CodeBuilder[/mixt_headline][vc_column_text]MIXT also includes a lightweight, easy to use shortcode builder called CodeBuilder.With it, you can easily generate the code for any element in an intuitive, user-friendly interface. It can be used wherever the WordPress editor is available, by clicking the [+] button.[/vc_column_text][mixt_headline]Styler[/mixt_headline][vc_column_text]Some elements come with Styler integration. Styler is an awesome helper that allows you to edit many aspects of the element, and then saves the custom style and outputs it as CSS. This means that, along withthe many predefined colors available to choose from, you can also customize any particular element in-depth, or change just one property, like the border color.[/vc_column_text][mixt_headline]Other Elements[/mixt_headline][vc_column_text]Besides MIXT's custom elements, you also have all the elements included in the Visual Composer plugin at your disposal. See the40+ Visual Composer elements here.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Row Separators
item.dc:creator: alex
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row" first_row="true" separator="triangle" cols_matchheight="" css=".vc_custom_1436448907852{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Row separators are great for making your pages more distinguishable, adding depth and a nice visual touch to those boring plainrows.

Let's start off with a simple, but stillappealing triangle.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" first_row="" separator="triangle-inv" cols_matchheight="" el_class="bg-dark" css=".vc_custom_1436466412271{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 92px !important;background-image: url(http://novalx.com/mixt/demo_img/2015/07/Lowpoly-Orange.jpg?id=546) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Not badat all!Put a call to action button hereand BAM! Guaranteed sale.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" first_row="" separator="curve" cols_matchheight="" css=".vc_custom_1436468239191{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Notice how there are two types of triangles above?

That's because MIXT has both normal and inverted separators.Normal separators overlay the next row with the chosenshape, while inverted ones overlay the current row with an area with thechosen shape cut out, so the effect can be applied even if the row has a background image applied.

Moving on, how about something more modern... a curve, maybe?

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" first_row="" separator="curve-inv" cols_matchheight="" css=".vc_custom_1436473362933{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;background-image: url(http://novalx.com/mixt/demo_img/2015/07/Lowpoly-Orange.jpg?id=546) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}" el_class="bg-dark"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Cool!

Cooler than ice at the poles, scientists claim! *

* Not actual scientists, just our marketing team.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" first_row="" separator="big-triangle" cols_matchheight="" css=".vc_custom_1436468263585{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Had enough? Of course not, there are more styles to go!

Bonus, here's some corporate gibberish!My boss told me people love this stuff!Synergistically evolve 2.0 technologies rather than just in time initiatives. Quickly deploy strategic networks with compelling e-business. Credibly pontificate highly efficient manufactured products and enabled data.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" first_row="" separator="big-triangle-inv" cols_matchheight="" css=".vc_custom_1436473391780{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;background-image: url(http://novalx.com/mixt/demo_img/2015/07/Lowpoly-Orange.jpg?id=546) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}" el_class="bg-dark"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

This row is a huge arrow!

Because its separator is a really wide triangle.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row separator_color="#eeeeee" separator_icon="fa fa-check" first_row="" separator="circle" cols_matchheight="" css=".vc_custom_1445276382573{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

That's nice, but what about...

Icons? You bet! Here's a circle style separator with an icon, as well as a different color.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: .vc_custom_1436448907852{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;}.vc_custom_1436466412271{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 92px !important;background-image: url(http://novalx.com/mixt/demo_img/2015/07/Lowpoly-Orange.jpg?id=546) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}.vc_custom_1436468239191{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;}.vc_custom_1436473362933{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;background-image: url(http://novalx.com/mixt/demo_img/2015/07/Lowpoly-Orange.jpg?id=546) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}.vc_custom_1436468263585{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;}.vc_custom_1436473391780{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;background-image: url(http://novalx.com/mixt/demo_img/2015/07/Lowpoly-Orange.jpg?id=546) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}.vc_custom_1445276382573{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;}

item.title: Carousel
item.dc:creator: alex
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]With the carousel elementyou can display a lot of content in a limited space, and in an interactive way. It can display any HTML content and shortcodes, is mobile (swipe) friendly, and gracefully falls back if JavaScript is disabled so your content will not be hidden.[/vc_column_text][mixt_headline]BasicExample[/mixt_headline][mixt_carousel settings="auto" ui_settings="nav,dark-nav,eqslides"]

This is a carousel element

It can contain images or any other HTML content, and even shortcodes!

___

This is the second slide

___

Final slide

Phew, I was running out of things to write!

[/mixt_carousel][mixt_headline]Features[/mixt_headline][mixt_iconlist][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="green"]Can display any HTML content, including shortcodes, as well asimages[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="green"]Slides can be plain or bordered[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="green"]Horizontal or vertical orientation[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="green"]Control transition effect (slide or fade)[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="green"]Set the carousel to autoplay, loop, and also set the delay between slides[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="green"]Control whether to display the navigation arrows andthe pagination bullets[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="green"]Equalize the height of all slides or let the carousel expand and contract to suit the content[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="green"]Control how many slides are visible at once forlarge, medium and small screen sizes[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="green"]Open a custom link or display the carousel images in a lightbox when a slide is clicked[/mixt_iconlist_item][/mixt_iconlist][mixt_headline]Image Example[/mixt_headline][mixt_carousel type="img" settings="loop" items="3" items_tablet="2" ui_settings="nav" action="lightbox" images="634,631,625,622,606" img_size="full"][/mixt_carousel][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Flipcard
item.dc:creator: alex
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row first_row="" cols_matchheight=""][vc_column][vc_column_text]Flip cards are perfect for drawing attention and revealing extra content, useful links or buttons, and anyother HTML and shortcodes.[/vc_column_text][mixt_headline]Examples[/mixt_headline][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][mixt_flipcard front_color="grey"]

item.title: Form
item.dc:creator: alex
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]The form element will help you easily create contact forms andany other type of form. Add as many fields as you want, make them required, arrange them with drag and dropandset their width in columns. Hook the form into any backend function by setting a custom action. You can also choose how the labels are displayed (at the top, on the side, or hidden).[/vc_column_text][mixt_headline]Example[/mixt_headline][mixt_form button="color:black" btn_text="Do Nothing"][mixt_field cols="col-sm-6" id="form-field-1" label="Text field"][mixt_field cols="col-sm-6" id="form-field-2" label="Text field (required)" required="true"][mixt_field type="textarea" id="form-field-3" label="Textarea"][mixt_field type="checkbox" id="form-field-4" label="Subscribe me to over 100 spammy newsletters!" required="true"][/mixt_form][mixt_headline]Features[/mixt_headline][mixt_iconlist][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Text, password, textarea and checkbox field types[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Customize submit button width, color and size[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Create any number of layouts by setting the number of columns for each field[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Hook into any handler function with the action setting, contact form handler included[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Make fields required, set the label text and position (top, left or hidden) as well as the placeholder text[/mixt_iconlist_item][/mixt_iconlist][mixt_headline]Log In Example[/mixt_headline][mixt_form form_type="custom" labels="none" btn_text="Log In"][mixt_field cols="col-sm-4" id="username" placeholder="Username" required="true"][mixt_field type="password" cols="col-sm-4" id="password" placeholder="Password" required="true"][/mixt_form][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Google Map
item.dc:creator: alex
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]The map element comes in handy when you need to show off one (or multiple) locations right inside of a Google Map, complete with lots of options, including the map's height, color hue, custom marker image and what UI controls to display.[/vc_column_text][mixt_headline]Basic Example[/mixt_headline][mixt_map style="map-rounded" zoom="16" locations="34.058475 -118.246587"][/mixt_map][mixt_headline]Features[/mixt_headline][mixt_iconlist][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Very easy to use[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Can show as many locations as you want[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Show HTML content when clicking on a marker[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Customize the location marker with your own custom image[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Personalize the map and integrate it nicely with the rest of your site[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Various styles to choose from, including rounded, bordered, outlined and 3D shadow[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Choose what controls to show on the map, like zoom, Street View, panning and map type[/mixt_iconlist_item][/mixt_iconlist][mixt_headline]Advanced Example[/mixt_headline][mixt_map style="map-shadow-3d" ui_controls="zoom,pan,map_type" locations="40.712784 -74.005941,55.755826 37.6173,48.856614 2.352222,35.689487 139.691706" marker_icon="786" style_hue="#dd9933"]New York Offices ___ Moscow Offices ___ Paris Offices ___ Tokyo Offices[/mixt_map][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Headline
item.dc:creator: alex
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Headlines are perfect for titles, headings or separators with text and even icons or images. There are several styles available to choose from, so they can be integrated into any type of design.[/vc_column_text][mixt_headline align="center"]Studies show headlines attract attention[/mixt_headline][mixt_headline style="line" line_style="dashed" color="juicy-pink"]Left aligned with separator[/mixt_headline][mixt_headline style="icon-line" align="right" line_style="double" color="green" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-newspaper-o"]Double separator with icon ___ And a description[/mixt_headline][mixt_headline]Features[/mixt_headline][mixt_iconlist][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Several styles to choose from[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Choose the alignment - left, center or right[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Select what heading tag to use, <h1> to <h6>[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Choose the color, style, width and thickness of the separator line(s)[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]The separator can include a font icon or image[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Add a description underneath the heading text[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Choose the separator location (on top, between the heading and description, or the bottom)[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Styler integration - choose any custom color for the text, separator and icon[/mixt_iconlist_item][/mixt_iconlist][mixt_headline]More Examples[/mixt_headline][mixt_headline style="line" align="center" color="juicy-pink" styler=".styler-O2u5pvJ .sideline:after{border-top-width: 4px;}|.styler-O2u5pvJ .separator{width: 25px;}"]Trendy[/mixt_headline][vc_empty_space height="20px"][mixt_headline align="center" line_style="dotted" color="sky"]Dotted[/mixt_headline][vc_empty_space height="20px"][mixt_headline style="icon-line" align="center" line_style="dashed" color="black" icon_type="image" image="786"]Icon Separator[/mixt_headline][vc_empty_space height="20px"][mixt_headline style="line" align="center" sep_position="bottom"]Simple Line Separator on bottom ___ With description[/mixt_headline][vc_empty_space height="20px"][mixt_headline style="icon-line" align="center" sep_position="top" color="sandy-brown" icon_type="linecons" icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-heart"]Icon Separator With Lines on top[/mixt_headline][vc_empty_space height="20px"][mixt_headline style="icon-line" align="center" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-eyedropper" styler=".styler-gr09Cm1 .headline-content{color: #96c40d;}|.styler-gr09Cm1 .sideline:after{border-color: #ef26c0;}|.styler-gr09Cm1 .sep-icon{color: #20bec9;}"]Custom Colors[/mixt_headline][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Icon Box
item.dc:creator: alex
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Icon boxes are great for displaying your product's features, your services, or just about anything else in a nicely formatted box along with an icon or image of your choice. There are loads of options available forfine-tuning the appearance of the icon box as well as its text and icon alignment.[/vc_column_text][mixt_headline]Examples[/mixt_headline][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][mixt_iconbox title="This is a great feature" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-cloud" icon_color="blue" icon_bg="accent" icon_pos="title-left"]Seamlessly visualize quality intellectual capital without superior collaboration and idea-sharing. Holistically pontificate installed base portals after maintainable products.[/mixt_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][mixt_iconbox title="Another great feature" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-cube" icon_color="orange" icon_bg="accent" icon_pos="title-left"]Phosfluorescently engage worldwide methodologies with web-enabled technology. Interactively coordinate proactive e-commerce via process-centric "outside the box" thinking.[/mixt_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][mixt_headline]Features[/mixt_headline][mixt_iconlist][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Several styles and colors to choose from[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Several icon styles and sizes available[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Icon or image can be positioned and aligned in all possible directions[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Boxes can be animated when entering the viewport[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Icons can be animated on hover to provide a nice interactive effect[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Styler integration - can choose any background, text and border colors as well as add custom CSS code[/mixt_iconlist_item][/mixt_iconlist][mixt_headline]MoreExamples[/mixt_headline][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][mixt_iconbox style="bordered" border_color="orange" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-archive" icon_style="background" icon_bg="accent" icon_size="icon-lg" icon_pos="left"]Efficiently unleash cross-media information without cross-media value. Quickly maximize timely deliverables for real-time schemas. Dramatically maintain clicks-and-mortar.[/mixt_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][mixt_iconbox style="bordered" border_color="blue" icon_type="image" icon_bg="accent" icon_size="icon-lg" icon_pos="left" image="12"]Efficiently unleash cross-media information without cross-media value. Quickly maximize timely deliverables for real-time schemas.[/mixt_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][mixt_iconbox style="solid" box_color="black" animation="fadeInLeft" icon_style="icon-solid icon-circle" icon_bg="red" icon_anim="anim-focus"]Credibly innovate granular internal or "organic" sources whereas high standards in web-readiness.[/mixt_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][mixt_iconbox style="solid" box_color="orange" title="81% of facts are made up" animation="fadeIn" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-bar-chart" icon_style="icon-solid icon-rounded" icon_bg="black" icon_pos="left" icon_anim="anim-invert" icon_out="true"]Dramatically synthesize integrated schemas with optimal networks.[/mixt_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][mixt_iconbox style="solid" title="No photos allowed" animation="fadeInRight" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-ban" icon_style="icon-solid icon-circle" icon_color="red" icon_bg="white" icon_size="icon-lg" icon_pos="bottom" icon_halign="right" icon_anim="anim-rotate" icon_out="true" styler=".styler-HKUQt8B .inner{background-color: #fff2f2;color: #dd3333;border-color: #dda6a6;}"]Interactively procrastinate high-payoff content without backward-compatible data.[/mixt_iconbox][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Icon List
item.dc:creator: alex
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Icon lists are perfect for displaying features, services, or otherwise any type of items in a spiced up, stylish list. Choose from several icon sizes, colors and background shapes. Icons can be aligned on the left or the right side.[/vc_column_text][mixt_headline]Example & Features[/mixt_headline][mixt_iconlist][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Several icon styles and background shapes[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Customize icon color, size and alignment[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Add animations to icons on hover for an interactive effect[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Use icon from icon fonts or even a custom image[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Animate items whenthey become visible with awesome, eye-catching effects[/mixt_iconlist_item][/mixt_iconlist][mixt_headline]More Examples[/mixt_headline][mixt_iconlist][mixt_iconlist_item icon_bg="accent"]Plain icon on the left[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item align="right" icon_style="icon-solid icon-rounded" icon_bg="green" icon_anim="anim-invert anim-fall"]Rounded, animated icon on the right[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_style="icon-outline icon-circle" icon_color="black" icon_bg="black" icon_size="icon-sm"]Small circle outlined icon[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item align="right" animation="bounceIn" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-bomb" icon_bg="accent" icon_size="icon-xl"]Animated item with big icon[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_type="image" icon_bg="green" image="12"]Image icon[/mixt_iconlist_item][/mixt_iconlist][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Pricing Table
item.dc:creator: alex
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Pricing tables will show off your products, services or subscription plans side-by-side, showing each one's features, specs, and so on. Your customers can easily compare each and choose the best one for them.[/vc_column_text][mixt_headline]Example[/mixt_headline][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][mixt_pricing plan_desc="" button="color:grey"][mixt_pricing_row]Some[/mixt_pricing_row][mixt_pricing_row]Great Awesome[/mixt_pricing_row][mixt_pricing_row]Features[/mixt_pricing_row][mixt_pricing_row]Here[/mixt_pricing_row][/mixt_pricing][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][mixt_headline]Features[/mixt_headline][mixt_iconlist][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Light or dark base color schemes[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Make the header stand out by choosing from several colors[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Smart currency formatting,with decimal supportandcurrency symbol before or after the price[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Add as many features/items as you like, they can even contain HTML[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Customize the button color, text, link and size for each table[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Highlight one or more tables to make them stand out and indicate they are the best value/most popular option[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Styler integration - choose any custom background, text and border colors for the table and the header[/mixt_iconlist_item][/mixt_iconlist][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row first_row="" cols_matchheight="" css=".vc_custom_1438906074720{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column][mixt_headline]MoreExamples[/mixt_headline][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column el_class="pricing-row"][mixt_pricing plan_name="Basic" plan_desc="For your primal needs" price="25" btn_text="Go Basic" button="color:black" plan_time="per month"][mixt_pricing_row]5 Projects[/mixt_pricing_row][mixt_pricing_row]10 Collaborators[/mixt_pricing_row][mixt_pricing_row]Automatic Backups[/mixt_pricing_row][mixt_pricing_row]Private Cloud Server[/mixt_pricing_row][/mixt_pricing][mixt_pricing plan_name="Advanced" plan_desc="Basically more advanced" price="$49.99" color="accent" btn_text="Go Advanced" button="color:primary" plan_time="per month" highlight="true"][mixt_pricing_row]Best Value[/mixt_pricing_row][mixt_pricing_row]50Projects[/mixt_pricing_row][mixt_pricing_row]100 Collaborators[/mixt_pricing_row][mixt_pricing_row]Automatic Backups[/mixt_pricing_row][mixt_pricing_row]Private Cloud Server[/mixt_pricing_row][/mixt_pricing][mixt_pricing plan_name="Ultimate" plan_desc="You're not ready for this" price="199.99" scheme="dark" btn_text="Go Ultimate" button="color:orange" plan_time="per month" styler=".styler-J3ulomU .mixt-pricing-inner{border-color: #dd9933;border-width: 0;}"][mixt_pricing_row]UnlimitedProjects[/mixt_pricing_row][mixt_pricing_row]UnlimitedCollaborators[/mixt_pricing_row][mixt_pricing_row]Automatic Backups[/mixt_pricing_row][mixt_pricing_row]Private Cloud Server[/mixt_pricing_row][/mixt_pricing][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Profile
item.dc:creator: alex
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]The profile element is perfect for displaying a person's photo and name, along with their title or position at the company, a short bio, and their websites and social network profiles or pages.[/vc_column_text][mixt_headline]Example[/mixt_headline][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][mixt_profile image_style="image-rounded" social_pos="header" btn_color="shade" image="503" name="Steve Palmer" title="Webmaster" button="color:default"][/mixt_profile][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][mixt_headline]Features[/mixt_headline][mixt_iconlist][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Various image styles to choose from[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Include the person's name, position/title and a bio[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Display any links, like websites and social network profiles, along with an icon and even a tooltip[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Display the linksnext to the name, at the bottom or inside an image overlay[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Various colors for the image overlay[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Choose the overlay transition in and transition outfrom 38+ animations[/mixt_iconlist_item][/mixt_iconlist][mixt_headline]MoreExamples[/mixt_headline][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][mixt_profile image_style="image-rounded image-border" image_border_color="green" image_hover_color="blue" image_hover_in="bounceIn" image_hover_out="bounceOut" social="https://facebook.com|fa fa-facebook|John on Facebook,https://twitter.com|fa fa-twitter|John on Twitter" name="John Sno" title="Watchmaker" image="500" button="color:green,size:btn-xl"]Completely synergize resource taxing relationships via premier niche markets. Professionally cultivate one-to-one customer service with robust ideas.[/mixt_profile][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][mixt_profile image_style="image-circle image-outline" image_border_color="orange" image_hover_color="orange" image_hover_in="flipInY" image_hover_out="flipOutY" name="Debbie Downer" title="Buzzkill" image="502" button="color:black,size:btn-lg"]Dynamically procrastinate B2C users after installed base benefits. Dramatically visualize customer directed convergence without revolutionary ROI.[/mixt_profile][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][mixt_profile image_style="image-shadow-3d" image_hover_color="blue" image_hover_in="bounceIn" image_hover_out="bounceOut" social="https://facebook.com|fa fa-facebook|Wolfie on Facebook,https://twitter.com|fa fa-twitter|Wolfie on Twitter,https://example.com|fa fa-globe|Wolfie's Website" social_pos="bottom" name="Wolfie" title="Woodland Creature" image="614" button="color:blue"]Interactively procrastinate high-payoff content without backward-compatible data. Quickly cultivate optimal processes and tactical architectures.[/mixt_profile][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Review
item.dc:creator: alex
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Review elements are great for displaying user reviews or testimonials for your products, services, or company in general. There are many styles to choose from, and each element can be customized in-depth.[/vc_column_text][mixt_headline]Example[/mixt_headline][mixt_review style="quote" layout="left" image_style="image-rounded" name="Clark Atwood" title="Reviewer" image="503"]Efficiently unleash cross-media information without cross-media value. Quickly maximize timely deliverables for real-time schemas. Dramatically maintain clicks-and-mortar solutions without functional solutions.[/mixt_review][mixt_headline]Features[/mixt_headline][mixt_iconlist][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Several styles to choose from - plain, boxed, speech bubbleandquote[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Include the reviewer's photo, name, title/position and website[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Choose where to display the reviewer's info, even the image alignment[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Several image styles to choose from[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Can be animated once it becomes visible[/mixt_iconlist_item][/mixt_iconlist][mixt_headline]MoreExamples[/mixt_headline][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][mixt_review style="boxed" boxed_color="green" image_halign="right" image_style="image-circle image-border" image_border_color="blue" animation="bounceIn" name="Boxed Review" title="Boxed Reviews, Inc" image="500"]Proactively envisioned multimedia based expertise and cross-media growth strategies.[/mixt_review][mixt_review style="bubble" bubble_color="white" layout="right" image_style="image-rounded" animation="zoomIn" name="Custom Colors" title="Colors Unlimited, Ltd." image="501" styler=".styler-6Xm7qy9{background-color: #f2dcbc;color: #a86e23;border-color: #dd9933;}"]Globally incubate standards compliant channels before scalable benefits. Quickly disseminate superior deliverables whereas web-enabled applications.[/mixt_review][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][mixt_review style="bubble" bubble_color="black" layout="bottom" image_style="image-rounded" animation="zoomIn" name="Speech Bubble Review" title="Arrow Target" web="http://example.com" image="502"]Seamlessly visualize quality intellectual capital without superior collaboration and idea-sharing.[/mixt_review][mixt_review layout="bottom" image_style="image-rounded" animation="fadeIn" name="Plain Review" title="Why so stylish?"]Phosfluorescently engage worldwide methodologies with web-enabled technology. Interactively coordinate proactive e-commerce via process-centric "outside the box" thinking. Completely pursue scalable customer service through sustainable potentialities.[/mixt_review][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Social Icons
item.dc:creator: alex
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]The Social Icons element displays your social network links, with various styles and options. You can choose what links to display from the ones registered in the options panel.[/vc_column_text][mixt_headline]Example[/mixt_headline][mixt_social style="group" hover="bg" profiles="facebook,twitter,google+,linkedin,pinterest" color="" btn_size="" button="color:default"][mixt_headline]Features[/mixt_headline][mixt_iconlist][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Display icons as plain links, buttons, button groups or as a nav menu[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Customize the button color and size[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Choose to color the background or the icon on hover[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Display all icons set in the options panel, orselect just the ones you want[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Add as many custom social profiles as you want in the options panel, each with its own link, icon, color and tooltip text[/mixt_iconlist_item][/mixt_iconlist][mixt_headline]More Examples[/mixt_headline][mixt_social hover="bg" profiles="facebook,twitter,google+" button="color:red"][mixt_social style="group" profiles="facebook,twitter,google+" button="color:black,size:btn-xl"][mixt_social style="plain" profiles="facebook,twitter,google+,youtube,linkedin,instagram,pinterest,tumblr"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Stat & Counter
item.dc:creator: alex
item.content:encoded: [vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]The stat and counter element is very much self-explanatory - stylishly display a statistic like number of products sold, hours of work, clients served etc. with a description. You can set a time for the counter, and the number will count from the starting value to the final value in that time. You can also include an icon anywhere in the stat, and even display a donut-type chart.[/vc_column_text][mixt_headline]Example[/mixt_headline][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][mixt_stat type="box" from="0" value="100" speed="5000" color="black"]Completion: {value}%[/mixt_stat][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][mixt_headline]Features[/mixt_headline][mixt_iconlist][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Box or circle style[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Various colors to choose from[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Set the circle's filled and empty colors separately[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Boxed variant has 2 styles: background color and outlined[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Set the starting value and the final value separately[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Adjust the time it takes to count to the final value, or set to 0 to display instantly[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Display any HTML, even icons, and set the value position with a placeholder tag "{value}"[/mixt_iconlist_item][mixt_iconlist_item icon_color="green" icon_bg="accent"]Styler integration -
